scripts.binaries: echo '=> Installing Binaries' && npm install -g bower pm2 less jade html-minifier uglify-js uglifycss imagemin-cli json && echo '=> Installing Binaries OK'
scripts.binaries:extended: echo '=> Installing extended Binaries' && npm install -g mocha standard istanbul markdown-html mochawesome raml2html jsdoc jade-lint jsonlint-cli retire nsp && echo '=> Installing extended Binaries'
scripts.lint: echo '=> Linting Files' && npm run lint:jade && npm run lint:less && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:json && echo '=> Linting Files OK'
scripts.lint:jade: echo -n '==> Linting JADE ...' && jade-lint assets/html/*.jade && echo 'OK'
scripts.lint:less: echo -n '==> Linting LESS ...' && lessc --lint assets/css/*.less && echo 'OK'
scripts.lint:json: echo -n '==> Linting JSON ...' && jsonlint-cli package.json && echo 'OK'
scripts.test: echo '=> Performing Tests'  && npm run test:code && npm run test:loadtest  && echo '=> Performing Tests OK'
scripts.test:code: echo '==> Mocha' && istanbul cover _mocha -- tests/*.js -R mochawesome && echo 'OK'
scripts.doc: echo '=> Creating Docs' && npm run doc:istanbul && npm run doc:markdown && npm run doc:mocha && npm run doc:raml && npm run doc:jsdoc && echo '=> Creating Docs OK'
scripts.doc:istanbul: echo -n '==> Copying Coverage ...' && rsync -avq coverage/ docs/coverage/ && rm -rf coverage/ && echo 'OK'
scripts.doc:markdown: echo -n '==> Creating HTML ...' && markdown-html docs/README.md -o docs/index.html && markdown-html README.md -o docs/readme.html && echo 'OK'
scripts.doc:mocha: echo -n '==> Copying Testreports ...' && rsync -avq mochawesome-reports/ docs/mochawesome-reports/ && rm -rf mochawesome-reports/ && echo 'OK'
scripts.doc:raml: echo -n '==> Creating API-Doc ...' && raml2html docs/api.raml > docs/api.html && echo 'OK'
scripts.doc:jsdoc: echo -n '==> Creating JSDoc ...' && jsdoc libs/* routes/* tests/* app.js -d docs/jsdoc/ && echo 'OK'
scripts.bower: echo '=> Downloading Bower Assets' && echo '==> Bower install' && bower install --allow-root && echo '=> Downloading Bower Assets OK'
scripts.build: echo '=> Building Website Assets' && npm run build:baseline && npm run build:html && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:images && npm run build:bootstrap && npm run build:jquery && npm run build:shakejs && npm run build:flag-icons && npm run build:font-awesome && npm run build:glyphicons && npm run build:angular && echo '=> Building Website Assets OK'
scripts.build:dev: echo '=> Building Website Assets' && npm run build:baseline && npm run build:html:dev && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:images && npm run build:bootstrap && npm run build:jquery && npm run build:shakejs && npm run build:flag-icons && npm run build:font-awesome && npm run build:glyphicons && npm run build:angular && echo '=> Building Website Assets OK'
scripts.build:baseline: echo -n '==> Building Folders ...' && mkdir -p public && mkdir -p tmp && rm -rf public/* &&  rm -rf tmp/* && mkdir -p public/css && mkdir -p public/flags && mkdir -p public/js && mkdir -p public/images && mkdir -p public/fonts && mkdir -p tmp/css && mkdir -p tmp/js && mkdir -p tmp/images && mkdir -p tmp/html && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:html: echo -n '==> Building HTML ...' && jade assets/html/index.jade --obj '{ "dev": false }' -o tmp/html/ > /dev/null && jade assets/html/share.jade -o tmp/html/ > /dev/null && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:html:dev: echo -n '==> Building HTML ...' && jade assets/html/index.jade --obj '{ "dev": true }' -o tmp/html/ > /dev/null && jade assets/html/share.jade -o tmp/html/ > /dev/null && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:js: echo -n '==> Building JS ...' && cp assets/js/*.js tmp/js/ && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:css: echo -n '==> Building CSS ...' && lessc assets/css/main.less tmp/css/main.css && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:images: echo -n '==> Building Images ...' && cp assets/images/* tmp/images/ 2>>/dev/null | true && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:bootstrap: echo -n '==> Building Bootstrap ...' && cp bower_components/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css tmp/css/bootstrap.min.css && cp bower_components/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js tmp/js/bootstrap.min.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:jquery: echo -n '==> Building jQuery ...' && cp bower_components/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js tmp/js/jquery.min.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:shakejs: echo -n '==> Building shake.js ...' && cp bower_components/shake.js/shake.js tmp/js/shake.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:flag-icons: echo -n '==> Building Flag-Icons ...' && cp bower_components/flag-icon-css/css/flag-icon.min.css tmp/css/flag-icon.min.css && cp -r bower_components/flag-icon-css/flags/* public/flags && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:font-awesome: echo -n '==> Building Font-Awesome ...' && cp bower_components/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css tmp/css/font-awesome.min.css && cp bower_components/font-awesome/fonts/* public/fonts/ && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:glyphicons: echo -n '==> Building glyphicons ...' && cp bower_components/bootstrap/fonts/* public/fonts/ && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:angular: echo '==> Building angular' && cp bower_components/angular/angular.min.js public/js/angular.min.js && npm run build:angular:cookies && npm run build:angular:colorpicker && npm run build:angular:numberpicker && npm run build:angular:tooltips && npm run build:angular:animate && npm run build:angular:socialshare && npm run build:angular:bootstrap && echo '==> Building angular OK'
scripts.build:angular:cookies: echo -n '===> Building angular-cookies ...' && cp bower_components/angular-cookies/angular-cookies.min.js tmp/js/angular-cookies.min.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:angular:numberpicker: echo -n '===> Building angular-numberpicker ...' && cp bower_components/angular-number-picker/dist/angular-number-picker.min.js tmp/js/angular-number-picker.min.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:angular:colorpicker: echo -n '===> Building angular-bootstrap-colorpicker ...' && cp bower_components/angular-bootstrap-colorpicker/css/colorpicker.css tmp/css/colorpicker.css && cp bower_components/angular-bootstrap-colorpicker/js/bootstrap-colorpicker-module.js tmp/js/bootstrap-colorpicker-module.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:angular:tooltips: echo -n '===> Building angular-tooltips ...' && cp bower_components/angular-tooltips/dist/angular-tooltips.min.css tmp/css/angular-tooltips.min.css && cp bower_components/angular-tooltips/dist/angular-tooltips.min.js tmp/js/angular-tooltips.min.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:angular:animate: echo -n '===> Building angular-animate ...' && cp bower_components/angular-animate/angular-animate.min.js tmp/js/angular-animate.min.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:angular:socialshare: echo -n '===> Building angular-socialshare ...' && cp bower_components/angularjs-socialshare/dist/angular-socialshare.min.js tmp/js/angular-socialshare.min.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.build:angular:bootstrap: echo -n '===> Building angular-bootstrap ...' && cp bower_components/angular-bootstrap/ui-bootstrap-tpls.min.js tmp/js/ui-bootstrap-tpls.min.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.minify: echo '=> Minifying Files' && npm run minify:html && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:images && echo '=> Minifying Files OK'
scripts.minify:html: echo -n '==> Minifying HTML ...' && html-minifier --input-dir tmp/html/ --output-dir public/ && echo 'OK'
scripts.minify:js: echo -n '==> Minifying JS ...' && uuglifyjs tmp/js/* -o public/js/main.min.js -p 5 -c -m && echo 'OK'
scripts.minify:css: echo -n '==> Minifying CSS ...' && uglifycss tmp/css/* > public/css/main.min.css && echo 'OK'
scripts.minify:images: echo -n '==> Minifying Images ...' && imagemin tmp/images/* --out-dir=public/images && echo 'OK'
scripts.copy: echo '=> copy Files' && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:js && npm run copy:css && npm run copy:images && echo '=> copy Files OK'
scripts.copy:html: echo -n '==> copy HTML ...' && cp tmp/html/* public/ && echo 'OK'
scripts.copy:js: echo -n '==> copy JS ...' && cp tmp/js/*.js public/js/ && echo 'OK'
scripts.copy:css: echo -n '==> copy CSS ...' && cp tmp/css/*  public/css/ && echo 'OK'
scripts.copy:images: echo -n '==> copy Images ...' && cp tmp/images/* public/images && echo 'OK'
scripts.verify: echo '=> Verifying Deployment Process' && npm run verify:html && npm run verify:js && npm run verify:css && npm run verify:images && npm run verify:server && echo '=> Verifying Deployment Process OK'
scripts.verify:html: echo -n '==> Verifying HTML ...' && test -e public/index.html && test -e public/share.html && echo 'OK'
scripts.verify:js: echo -n '==> Verifying JS ...' && test -e public/js/verbshaker.js && test -e public/js/share.js && test -e public/js/angular.min.js && test -e public/js/bootstrap.min.js && test -e public/js/jquery.min.js && test -e public/js/angular-cookies.min.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.verify:css: echo -n '==> Verifying CSS ...' && test -e public/css/main.min.css && echo 'OK'
scripts.verify:images: echo -n '==> Verifying Images ...' && test -e public/images/android-chrome-192x192.png && test -e public/images/android-chrome-512x512.png && test -e public/images/apple-touch-icon.png && test -e public/images/browserconfig.xml && test -e public/images/favicon-16x16.png && test -e public/images/favicon-32x32.png && test -e public/images/favicon.ico && test -e public/images/manifest.json && test -e public/images/mstile-150x150.png && test -e public/images/safari-pinned-tab.svg && echo 'OK'
scripts.verify:server: echo -n '==> Verifying Server ...' && test -e app.js && test -e libs/proverbs.js && test -e libs/proverbCollection.js && test -e routes/proverbs.js && test -e routes/index.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.security: echo '=> Verifying Security Process' && npm run security:libs && npm run security:nsp && echo '=> Verifying Security Process OK'
scripts.security:nsp: echo -n '==> Verifying Vulnerabilities ...' && nsp check && echo 'OK'
scripts.deploy:
echo '=> Deploying verbshaker' && npm run binaries && npm run configure && npm install && npm run bower && npm run build && npm run minify && echo '<= READY TO START! =>
TYPE `npm start` to startup the Server'
scripts.deploy:dev:
echo '=> Devbuilding verbshaker' && npm run binaries && npm run binaries:extended && npm run configure && npm install && npm run bower && npm run security && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run doc && npm run build:dev && npm run copy && npm run verify && echo '<= READY TO START! =>
TYPE `npm start` to startup the Server'
